full_threads.body:
Domain name, SSL and Email Hosting discounts all running this May with VentraIP's MEGAMay sale. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

View in browser

Hi William,

Are you looking to expand your online presence? For a limited time only, level up and save with our MEGAMay sale! Take advantage of brand new $3.00 .co Domain Name and .online Domain Name registrations. These growing TLDs are highly memorable and can improve your overall SEO.

No coupon code required, the discount will be automatically applied upon checkout. There are no restrictions on who can register, so grab a new domain name today and start growing online.

​Don't miss out - we're also offering 15% off all SSL Certificates and 40% off our Dedicated Email Hosting services during our MEGAMay sale.

Special Offers

*Offers exclusively available during MEGAMay 2022 (01/05/2022 - 31/05/2022). Ts&Cs apply.

Don't forget - we're giving away $50,000 cash! Successfully refer any friend or family member to VentraIP during May and you'll be entered with your chance to win.

How can I enter/make a referral?

  • Refer a friend - Retrieve your unique referral code within VIPControl to pass on to your referee.

  • Purchase eligible services with us - Have your referee use your referral link to make a Web Hosting and Domain Name purchase and/or transfer.

  • Get paid out in CASH - After 60 days of the referee holding a valid Web Hosting service and Domain Name with us, you'll receive $50.00 cash in your VentraIP Wallet.

  • Enter the running for our Cash Giveaway - After a successful referral, both the referrer and referee will enter the draw to win a share of the $50,000 cash prize.

  • Wait and see if you're a lucky WINNER - The announcement of all winners will take place at 2:00 PM AEST on Monday, 1 August 2022 via our Facebook page.


Any questions? Check out our MEGAMay blog post for more information.
If you'd like to reach out to us, feel free to submit an eTicket from within VIPControl.


Need Help? We're Here to Assist
Our Australian based staff are here for you 24/7
